attributes.action: Change the way GCSE/A-LEVEL grades are being dictated for class 2021
attributes.additional_details: Teachers have to submit evidence for the final grades in which the upcoming assessment period will be one of the main forms of evidence and as much as it has been said that exams were cancelled, it doesn't feel like that at all. We are essentially having exams disguised by these new testing methods. There is no national basis, thus making it extremely difficult for students to truly prove themselves. After this difficult time, it is about time students were actually taken into consideration and prioritised.
attributes.background:
Review how grades are going to be determined for this summer and consider alterations more tailored to the students and their situation.
Trust our teachers to decide appropriate grades for students without submitting evidence.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Don’t allow the use of externally-set exams for 2021 grades: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/569280

Disallow Teacher Assessed Grades lower than a 5 for 2021 GCSEs and A-Levels: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/570955
